name: snakee-game
description: Snake game written in Typescript and Wasm

scripts.wasm:compile-dev: emcc src/wasm/main.cpp -s ASSERTIONS=1 -s FILESYSTEM=0 -s WASM=01 -O1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME="game" -s ENVIRONMENT="web" -s USE_SDL=2 -o dist/game.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_main', '_malloc', '_setGameMode', '_pauseGame','_resumeGame', '_playGame', '_resizeGame']" -s "EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall']" --std=c++1z
scripts.wasm:compile: emcc src/wasm/main.cpp -s -s WASM=1 -O3 --closure 1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME="game" -s ENVIRONMENT="web" -s USE_SDL=2 -o dist/game.js -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_main', '_malloc', '_setGameMode', '_pauseGame','_resumeGame', '_playGame', '_resizeGame']" -s "EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall']" --std=c++1z
scripts.build: npm run rollup:build && npm run wasm:compile

author: Justinas Delinda
